name: Squished by Luck
description:
Try to fit in the dice holes to survive.
Collect "it's" children to gain points.

 The black tiles on the sides will show you what side of the cube will fall on you. Remember that the holes are mirrored when upside down.

Get 15 of "it's" children in one go for a bigger challenge ;)

Good luck :>

---------------

C O N T R O L S: 
WASD / ARROWS

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 in 1.3 days

You literally dodge the ROLLING DICE.

----------------
